As of my knowledge cutoff, Disney California Adventure Park has not announced any specific summer events or fireworks displays similar to the "Summer Nights" event you mentioned. However, I can suggest some ways for you to stay informed about upcoming events and celebrations at the park:

1. Check the official Disneyland website: Keep an eye on the Disneyland website for announcements about summer events, fireworks displays, and special experiences at Disney California Adventure Park.
2. Follow Disney's social media accounts: Follow Disney's official social media accounts on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram to stay up-to-date on the latest news and announcements.
3. Sign up for the Disneyland newsletter: Register for the Disneyland newsletter to receive exclusive offers, news, and updates about special events and experiences.
4. Use the Disneyland app: Download the official Disneyland app to access park information, schedules, and special offers. You can also use the app to reserve FASTPASSes, mobile order food, and more.

If you're planning to visit Disney California Adventure Park this summer, I recommend checking the park's website and social media accounts regularly for updates on special events and fireworks displays. You can also consider contacting Disney's customer service or visiting the park's information center for more information.

Remember, Disney often announces special events and experiences with short notice, so it's essential to stay informed and flexible with your plans.
